SENT.plain: This article describes some of the miscellaneous etiologies of pediatric chest pain that are important to recognize early and diagnose
Up to 45% of pediatric chest pain cases may elude definitive diagnosis
Serious morbidity or mortality is infrequent

Accurate diagnosis of more obscure causes may help to avoid unnecessary emergency department evaluation and cardiology referral, while also alleviating the concern and stress families and patients experience when dealing with chest pain
